Question: Before her weekly column in Parade, vos this person wrote the Omni I.Q Quiz Contest for Omni, which contained "I.Q.
Hints: When vos this person replied "One out of three", readers wrote to argue that the odds were 50–50.
On 22 January 2012 vos this person admitted a mistake in her column.
As a teenager, vos this person spent her time working in her father's general store and enjoyed writing and reading.
